summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED WHILE TRAVELING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE SOUNDED AS IF SOMETHING  WAS RUBBING AGAINST THE GROUND.  THE VEHICLE WAS PULLED OVER AND INSPECTED.  THE REAR END WAS OBSERVED TO BE RIDING LOW.  AN INDEPENDENT REPAIR SHOP DETERMINED THE REAR SPRINGS WERE FRACTURED AND THEY WERE REPLACED.
